fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Repurpose up to two players at night. They are permanently marked as Scions. Whenever a Scion visits someone, that player is repurposed. Whenever a Scion visits another Scion, both players die.
**Nigh Calamity** â€” For each Scion, choose up to one player. They are redirected to that player through immunities.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you would die, a random Scion dies instead.
- You know who all Scions are at all times.
- The game cannot end while you're alive.
- If you win, all other factions lose.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See all other living players be repurposed.
